title: Prabowo Subianto - Wikipedia
snippet: On 21 September 2025, Prabowo signed a presidential decree that officially made Nusantara as the political capital city of Indonesia and targeted for its realization to be implemented in 2028.

title: President of Indonesia - Wikipedia
snippet: The president is the leader of ... to a five-year term, once renewable, allowing for a maximum of ten years in office. The current president is Prabowo Subianto, who assumed office on 20 October 2024....

title: What policies to expect from Indonesia's new president
snippet: The former special forces commander would review the possibility of lowering corporate income tax to 20% from 22%, according to media reports citing his adviser, though this would depend on its impact on revenues. It also remains to be seen whether Prabowo would raise the value-added tax (VAT) rate to 12% from 11% on January 1, 2025, an unpopular plan that has been set in motion by the current administration. ... Outgoing leader Widodo has made the $32 billion project to move Indonesia's capital 1,200 kilometers away from sinking Jakarta to Nusantara, on Borneo island, his main legacy project.

title: Prabowo Subianto | Biography, Career, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Prabowo Subianto (born October 17, 1951, Jakarta, Indonesia) is a former general of the Indonesian army and businessman who is now president of Indonesia (2024– ). Prabowo is the third of four children born to Sumitro Djojohadikusumo, a Javanese ...
